title: Forgotten password and cant access email
body: My friend Drag0n5lay3r in NA and forgot his password, he tried to recover and can't access email. Is there anyway for you to help him?

replies.body:
Account Recoveries must be done by [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with our accounts team. This is because recoveries require a fair amount of information that could potentially be too sensitive to post here on the boards. Have your friend reach out to us that way, so we can assist them with this.

Let me know if you have any questions.
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new Go send them a ticket and hopefully they can help
